name: Garbage Truck Drivers Wanted
description:
Play the role of the invisible heroes who guarantee the cleanliness of our environment. Drive your garbage truck through the streets and empty the trash cans before the city wakes up.

CAREER MODE

In the morning rush, every second counts. Do not forget to upgrade your truck as you progress in your career to be able to complete your task in time.

Drive carefully and avoid hitting the fire hydrants. They are extremely fragile and may cause big trouble when damaged.

MULTIPLAYER

Challenge your friend for a real-time two player race. The winner will be the one who empties the more trash cans.

Increase your chances of winning by upgrading your garbage truck.

Both of your devices must be connected to the same wifi network.
